previous.excerpt: Directus turns any SQL database into a no-code app and powerful API. Our open-source platform is completely migration-free, seamlessly layering on top of your new or existing database, providing you with a suite of tools to manage and connect your content.

next.excerpt: Alfread is a new kind of a read later app. It helps you to actually read saved articles. Or skip them. No pressure. Alfread helps you rediscover your love for reading what you've saved. One article at a time.
